citations.narrative:
The wall board is chipped where the wall meets the floor on the dry resting area in the indoor pool area. The decking
between the pools is chipping along the seams . The chipped areas have rough edges that may injure the animals .
Surfaces must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury .
These areas were repaired during inspection .
CORRECTED AT TIME OF INSPECTION
This inspection of Unit 1 and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee at Heart of Texas Fair , Waco Texas .
n

narrative:
3.101(a)(3) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The wall board is chipped where the wall meets the floor on the dry resting area in the indoor pool area. The decking 
between the pools is chipping along the seams . The chipped areas have rough edges that may injure the animals . 
Surfaces must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury . 
These areas were repaired during inspection . 
CORRECTED AT TIME OF INSPECTION 
 
This inspection of Unit 1  and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee at Heart of Texas Fair , Waco Texas .
